messages.subject: Hi Bonnie :)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Bonnie :) nooooo, I m not lost, life just swallowed me up for a while ... we returned from vacation to find my mother (77 yo, bless her heart) not doing
messages.messageBody:
Hi Bonnie :)

nooooo, I'm not lost, life just swallowed me up for a while ... we returned
from vacation to find my mother (77 yo, bless her heart) not doing well @
all, she gave us quite a scare ... I've been super busy w/ her, w/ dd, just
everything cascaded in on us @ once, so, my online time was put on the back
burner so to speak ... wow, it's nice to be MISSED, thanks :)

Pris ~> WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently
my cats have learned how to type ...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bonnie Painter" <bonniepainter@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 02, 2000 4:40 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] corporal punishment ...

> You have been lurking for a while Pris. I thought you got lost on
vacation
> and never made it back!
>
> Bonnie
